_header: The first six years of mans birth and age
Note:
Cf. Kalendar of Shepherdes (Sommer (1892)
XSommer, Heinrich Oskar. The Kalender of Shepherdes; the edition of Paris 1503 in facsimile, reprint of Pynson’s 1506. London: Paul, Trench, Trübner, 1892).
Subjects: human life, compared to months of the year; months, compared to man’s life; ages of man’s life
_description: Man’s life compared to the months of the year (six years = one month), adapted from the French — twelve cross-rhymed quatrains

LeedsBro15.First Lines:
The fyrst vij yeres of manys birth [a]nd [age]May well be compared
                    to Ianyuerffor in this monthe ys no strenght ne corageMore then in a
                    childe of the age of [ ]…
LeedsBro15.Last Lines:
…Nature with age wyll hym on message sendeThe tyme ys come
                    that he must go hym selue
